heroBanner: Available for remote work • Frontend Developer • Based in Thuringia •
aboutMeText:
Hi, I’m a german speaking Frontend Developer based in Thuringia.
          Motivated by the limitless opportunities within IT, I am excited about crafting visually captivating
          and intuitive websites and applications.
aboutMeLocation: Flexible in terms of working environments, I can work effectively both on-site in Thuringia and remotely.
aboutMeMind: I am open-minded and always looking for personal challenges to constantly improve my knowledge and skills.
skillMyJurney:
My journey has involved working on diverse projects,
          employing a range of frontend technologies and concepts.
          I am open to embracing new technologies and methodologies to Continously enhance my skills and stay ahead in the ever-evolving landscape of web development.
skillFellFree:
Feel free to contact me.
            I look forward to expanding on my previous knowledge.

your ideas and contributing to your projects with my work.
